price: Allah will say, “Do not argue in My presence, for I had already given you the warning.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
